text: The Lego Batman Movie (seen as The LEGO Batman Movie) is a 2017 American 3D computer-animated superhero comedy movie. It is directed by Chris McKay and produced by Dan Lin, Roy Lee, Phil Lord and Chris Miller. The movie is written by Seth Grahame-Smith. ==Background== It is a spin-off of the 2014 movie The Lego Movie. It is based on the DC Comics character Batman. It will star Will Arnett as Batman, Ralph Fiennes as Alfred, Michael Cera as Robin, Rosario Dawson as Batgirl, Zach Galifianakis as The Joker, and Mariah Carey as the Mayor of Gotham City. The movie was released in the United States on February 10, 2017 through Warner Bros. Pictures. ==Cast== * Will Arnett as Batman / Bruce Wayne * Zach Galifianakis as Joker * Michael Cera as Dick Grayson / Robin * Rosario Dawson as Barbara Gordon / Batgirl * Ralph Fiennes as Alfred Pennyworth * Héctor Elizondo as Commissioner James Gordon * Jenny Slate as Dr. Harleen Quinzel / Harley Quinn * Mariah Carey as Mayor McCaskill * Billy Dee Williams as Harvey Dent / Two-Face * Conan O'Brien as Edward Nygma / The Riddler * Jason Mantzoukas as Dr. Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow * Doug Benson as Bane * Zoë Kravitz as Selina Kyle / Catwoman * Kate Micucci as Basil Karlo / Clayface * Riki Lindhome as Pamela Isley / Poison Ivy * Channing Tatum as Clark Kent / Superman * Jonah Hill as Hal Jordan / Green Lantern * Adam DeVine as Barry Allen / The Flash * Eddie Izzard as Lord Voldemort * Seth Green as King Kong * Jemaine Clement as Sauron * Ellie Kemper as Phyllis * Chris Hardwick as Television reporter ==Reviews== On review aggregation website Rotten Tomatoes the movie has an approval rating of 97% based on 35 reviews, with an average rating of 7.7/10. On Metacritic, which assigns a normalized rating to on reviews, the movie has a score of 75 out of 100, based on 15 critics, indicating "generally favorable reviews". ==References== Category:2017 comedy movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2017 computer-animated movies Category:American superhero movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:The Lego Movie (franchise) Category:Animated Batman movies Category:Lego movies Category:Warner Animation Group movies Category:Warner Bros. Animation movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Lego Batman Movie
